transcript.text: want to explain to you why I'm not
Facebook anymore I'm sure a whole bunch
of people I already got an email from a
friend of mine who's travelling to
Hawaii she's like it says we're not
friends on Facebook anymore what's going
on so people have been sending me some
messages on other platforms like hey how
come you're not on Twitter so let me
explain why I'm not on Twitter and
Facebook anymore
when I started writing books gosh back
in 2012 I started writing in 2009 really
blogging and all that but when I started
taking my blog articles and after my
friends pressured me to turn want to
turn these articles into a book on
healing I've been working on it for
about a year putting it together editing
all the stuff but I was at that time I
was spending probably 50 to 60 hours a
week on Facebook and I had an added job
where I could be on Facebook well it was
it on duty and I was on Facebook all the
time and I was building a community of
friends and Denise kind of thought I was
wasting my time but there was a there
was a purpose for it we were building a
community but it really got in the way
of my writing I was difficult to get
anything done outside of Facebook
because I was always answering prayer
requests answering messages responding
to other people's things so one night my
son had a dream my son does have quite a
few prophetic dreams so in his dream he
he was asking me a question he said and
dad when are you gonna get your book
finished and I had him come in the
bedroom and he followed me into the
bedroom and I picked up this book he
said it was like this thick it had like
over a thousand pages and he goes what's
that
and I told him that's my book and he
said when did you have time to write it
and I said I got off of Facebook that
was in like I think 2012 it was before I
wrote my first book so that was God's
Way of telling me look you have got to
get off us
Media once in a while you're never gonna
get any work done over the years since I
wrote that first book I have deactivated
my Facebook account
and periodically usually it's two or
three weeks sometimes four weeks have
gone as long as six weeks actually two
years ago but I got kicked off of
Facebook because of my name change they
didn't like my name they were going
through this big thing where they
weren't allowing people to use stage
names or pen names and they actually
closed down my account and I had to
start up a new one well it's actually
off Facebook I think for seven months at
that time just want to let people know I
will deactivate my social media accounts
from time to time when I have to work on
a project and right now we're trying to
get this novel finished I've been
working on this novel for four years I
finally got the first draft done gave it
to my editor she really likes it says it
has great bones but I need to probably
add about 30,000 words to the manuscript
I need to write a lot a few more
chapters and key chapters she wants me
to rework some scenes in the middle of
the book change the plotline a little
bit at another character or two so what
I'm going to be doing in the next gosh
two or three weeks is working on that
novel trying to get shaped up and I've
got some other books I'm working on and
working on a book on dream
interpretation I'm working on a book on
emotional healing and deliverance I'm
working on power authority made simple
I've got I always have three or four
books that I'm working on simultaneously
and I'm also working on my next class my
online class which is going to be
unseeing in the spirit so if I don't
take some time off of social media I
will never get the videos recorded for
the classes I'll never get these books
written my Twitter timeline is dark my
Facebook page is dark because I need to
get some work done
look if you need to contact me there are
